{"id":522762277,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1626322511,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/522762277/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.3 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        int temp=0;\n        ListNode dummy;\n        ListNode *ans = &dummy;\n        \n        while(l1 || l2 || temp){\n            if(l1){\n                temp+=l1->val;\n                l1 = l1->next;\n            }\n            if(l2){\n                temp+=l2->val;\n                l2 = l2->next;\n            }\n            ans->next = new ListNode(temp%10);\n            temp /= 10;\n            ans = ans->next;\n        }\n        return dummy.next;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
